title: Hiver Onboarding

ask: We need a more affordable pricing option, possibly with a few free seats, as the current cost is high for our needs.
evidence: Paying 150 dollars a month is a lot for us for… and two or three people are going to need very limited access.
title: Hiver Demo | Daniel <> Yukta
